fields.name: Fairtrade Textile Production Standard
fields.description: A certification that ensures fair trade practices in textile production.

fields.name: Fair for Life Kleding
fields.description: A certification for fair trade and social responsibility in the textile industry.

fields.name: Fair Wear Foundation
fields.description: A non-profit organization that works to improve labor conditions in the garment industry.

fields.name: OEKO-TEX Made in Green
fields.description: A traceable product label for textiles tested for harmful substances.
